articles.author: Nick Flaherty
articles.title: Enzyme generates electricity out of thin air - eeNews Europe
articles.description: A team of scientists have discovered an enzyme that converts trace amounts of hydrogen in air into energy for wearables or sensors
articles.content:
A team of scientists have discovered an enzyme that converts trace amounts of hydrogen in the air into energy to power wearables or act as a sensor.
While the research is at an early stage, the disc… [+3020 chars]
